verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] rejecting criticism that his ‘ ‘ zero - tolerance ’’ immigration policy has caused family separations at the U.S. southern border , and in a Monday morning blast of Twitter posts , criticized Democrats for not fixing the law , and pointing to crime in Germany and gangs in the U.S. as the reason tough laws are necessary . “ It is the Democrats fault for being weak and ineffective with Boarder Security and Crime .
